results.title: The Tales of Hoffmann = les contes d'Hoffmann
results.brief_description: The poet Hoffmann (Placido Domingo) recounts the sad tale of his three past loves; Olympia, Giulietta and Antonia (sung by Illeana Cotrubas, Agnes Baltsa and Luciana Serra), and reveals how the evil influence of his rival drove the lovers apart. Conducted by Georges Pretre, music by Jacques Offenbach. Sung in French with English subtitles.

results.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Miramax Films, William Horberg, Tom Sternberg and Anthony Minghella
results.brief_description: Based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, “The Talented Mr. Ripley” is a story about a charismatic sociopath who would rather be a ‘fake somebody than a real nobody’. Living and working in New York as a washroom attendant, Tom Ripley is faced with an opportunity he cannot refuse when a wealthy shipping tycoon mistakes him for a Princeton classmate of his son, Dickie. He proposes that Tom go to Italy in an attempt to bring his playboy son back home. When Tom finds and befriends both Dickie and is girlfriend, neither are aware the extremes Tom will go to in order to claim their lives as his own. Cast includes: Matt Damon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Cate Blanchett.

results.title: The Tale of the wonderful potato
results.brief_description: An animated history of the potato showing how the potato came to Europe, played a key role in the Napoleonic Wars and became a staple food. Includes particular reference to the potato famine which claimed the lives of millions who had come to depend on the potato, and how the potato became resistant to the fungus which caused the famine. Suggested audience: intermediate, secondary, general - English language.

results.title: The Tale of the Bunny Picnic
results.brief_description: The Day of the Bunny Picnic is the most exciting day of the year as every bunny knows, because it is the day the `storyteller’ arrives. Two bunnies, Twitch and Lugsy, are looking after their little brother, Bean. They are all on their way to visit their Great,Great,Great,Great Grandmother to borrow some thistle essence for their mother’s picnic cake. Along the way Bean spots something that no one else has ever seen, a DOG. When Bean tells everyone that he has seen a dog, they think he is telling tales. When the barking dog appears they all run for cover but the story ends happily with Friendly the dog living amongst all the cute bunnies in the forest.

results.title: The Tale of little pig Robinson
results.brief_description: Timothy Spall, Dawn French and Jennifer Saunders star in this adaptation of the classic Beatrix Potter story. Little pig Robinson is sent to market by his two maiden Aunts Dorcas and Porcas. On the way, he is “pignapped” and taken to sea where his adventures really begin. The moral is “Don’t talk to strangers” and in the end, good triumphs over evil.

results.title: The Tajik people: pottery making
results.creator_credit: Julien Bryan, International Film Foundation and Hermann Schlenker
results.brief_description: This film shows the potters of the village of Kulala, who are Tajik tribesmen in the Afghanistan mountains. Native music is used instead of English commentary or subtitles, and the film shows the preparation of the clay and the production of pots. These are traded and sold throughout Afghanistan.

results.title: The Tajik people: baking oven bread
results.creator_credit: International Film Foundation and Hermann Schlenker
results.brief_description: Shows how the Tajiks prepare their flat bread. Depicts a lone Moslem women kneading dough into a flattened round form and slapping it to the vertical walls of her clay oven. No narration. Suitable for school years prep-6.

results.title: The Tailor of Panama
results.brief_description: Set in 1999 Panama at the time of the handover of the canal to America, Geoffrey Rush plays Harry Pendel, an ex-con turned tailor to the towns elite. Harry meets Andrew Osnals (Pierce Brosnan), a British spy who convinces Harry to become his eyes and ears in regards to information on the political goings on in the area. What Andrew does not realise is that Harry is a master storyteller and not all that he claims to be, providing questionable information that is going to have dire consequences to all those involved in Harry’s web of deceit.

results.title: The Tailor from Torzhok
results.creator_credit: Mezhrabpom-Russ, Yakov Protazanov and Valentin Turkin
results.brief_description:
A simple tailor from a rural village unexpectedly strikes it rich in Leningrad in this fast paced satirical comedy which was commissioned to publicise the state lottery. Also available on 16mm.

Credits: Director, Yakov Protazanov ; script, V. Turkin ; photography, P. Yermolov.
Cast: L. Deikun, I. Ilyinsky.

results.title: The Ta Ching pioneers
results.brief_description: An insight into the founders of the Ta Ching oil fields and its present development. Produced under the direction of Chairman Mao, suppressed by the “Gang of Four” then re-released.
